properties.body:
BRAZIL-NORTH COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY BY M/V HAWK EXPLORER
   TOWING 5.4 MILE LONG CABLES:
   A. IN PROGRESS UNTIL 31 MAR
      ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      01-22S 041-18W AND 01-22S 039-19W.
   B. 01 AND 02 APR ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      00-03S 040-56W AND 01-59S 040-56W.
   C. 03 AND 04 APR ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      00-02S 040-13W AND 02-05S 040-13W.
   SEVEN MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 682/12.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 05 APR.
